text: Willi Holdorf (17 February 1940 â€” 5 July 2020) was a West German athlete. In 1964, he won the first Olympic gold medal for Germany in decathlon and was named German Sportspersonality of the Year. He was born in Blomesche Wildnis, Germany. Holdorf died on 5 July 2020 at his home in Achterwehr, Germany from an illness, aged 80.ehnkampf-Olympiasieger Holdorf gestorben ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:German athletes
